content.text:
# Mahadeshwara Pooja Phala

| country        = India
| language       = Kannada
}}
Mahadeshwara Pooja Phala () is a 1975 Indian Kannada-language film, directed by Sangram Singh and produced by S. V. Rajendra Singh. The film stars Srinath, B. V. Radha, Ramadevi, T. N. Balakrishna and Rajasree in the lead roles. The film has musical score by Satyam.
